info.description: Welcome to the Horizon Server API Reference documentation. This API reference provides comprehensive information about status of all Horizon Server components and resources.
info.title: Horizon Server API

tags.name: External
tags.description: APIs for resources that are external to Horizon environment.

get.summary: Lists instant clone domain accounts of the environment.
Lists Virtual Centers configured in the environment.
Lists information related to AD Domains of the environment.

post.summary: Logs in a user. Returns access token and refresh token.
post.description:
Note: UPN(e.g. testadmin@example.com) based login is not supported.
Only Administrators on Root access group are allowed to login.

get.summary: Lists monitoring information related to AD Domains of the environment.
Lists monitoring information related to Connection Servers of the environment.
Returns monitoring information related to Event database of the environment.
Lists monitoring information related to Farms of the environment.
Lists monitoring information related to Gateways registered in the environment.
Lists monitoring information related to RDS Servers of the environment.
Lists monitoring information related to SAML Authenticators of the environment.
Lists monitoring information related to the remote pods.
Lists monitoring information related to True SSO connectors.
Lists monitoring information related to View Composers of the environment.
Lists monitoring information related to Virtual Centers of the environment.

post.summary: Refreshes access token from refresh token.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Refresh token needed to generate new Access Token

dns_name.description: DNS name of the AD Domain.

netbios_name.description: NetBIOS name of the AD Domain.

ADDomainInfo.title: ADDomainInfo
ADDomainInfo.description: Information related to AD Domains of the environment.

id.description: Unique ID of the connection server.

name.description: Connection server host name or IP address.

status.description:
Status of the connection to the domain.
* UNCONTACTABLE: No domain controllers appear to be present on the network for this domain.
* FULLY_ACCESSIBLE: The domain controller(s) are accepting bind operations.
* CANNOT_BIND: The domain controller(s) are only accepting LDAP ping operations.
* UNKNOWN: Cannot determine accessibility.

trust_relationship.description:
The trust relationship for the domain.
* PRIMARY_DOMAIN: The domain is the domain that the broker is present in.
* FROM_BROKER: The domain is trusted by the domain that the broker is in.
* TO_BROKER: The domain trusts the broker's domain (this is for completeness and generally will not be used).
* TWO_WAY: The domain has a two way trust relationship with the broker's domain.
* TWO_WAY_FOREST: The domain is in the same forest as the broker's domain, implies two way trust.
* MANUAL: The domain was manually configured (the trust has not been detected).
* UNKNOWN: The trust relationship could not be determined.

ADDomainMonitorConnectionServer.title: ADDomainMonitorConnectionServer
ADDomainMonitorConnectionServer.description: Information about the AD Domain connection from connection server.

connection_servers.description: Information about the AD Domain connections from each of the connection servers.

dns_name.description: The DNS name for the domain.

netbios_name.description: The NetBIOS name for the domain.

nt4_domain.description: If this is an NT4 domain or not.

ADDomainMonitorInfo.title: ADDomainMonitorInfo
ADDomainMonitorInfo.description: Monitoring information related to AD Domain.

access_token.description: Access Token to be used in API calls.
Access Token to be used in API calls.

refresh_token.description: Refresh Token to be used to get a new Access token.

valid.description: Indicates if the certificate is valid.

valid_from.description: Start time of the certificate validity in milliseconds. Measured as epoch time.

valid_to.description: Expiration time of the certificate validity in milliseconds. Measured as epoch time.

type.description:
Type of Certificate.
* PEM: PEM encoded certificate type

CertificateOverrideData.title: CertificateOverrideData
CertificateOverrideData.description: Certificate details and type information, which can be used to override thumbprint details.

status.description:
Certificate Server status.
* OK: The state of the certificate server is OK as reported by the enrollment servers.
* WARN: At least one enrollment server reports a warning on this certificate server.
* ERROR: At least one enrollment server reports an error on this certificate server.

server_name.description: Connection Server host name or IP address.

status.description:
LDAP replication status.
* OK: The connection to the Connection Server is working properly.
* ERROR: There is a problem with LDAP replication to the Connection Server.

ConnectionServerMonitorCSReplication.title: ConnectionServerMonitorCSReplication
ConnectionServerMonitorCSReplication.description: Replication status with respect to Peer Connection Servers in the same cluster.

connection_count.description: Number of connections to this Connection Server.

cs_replications.description: Connection Server replication status with respect to the Peer Connection Servers in the same cluster.

default_certificate.description: Indicates whether server has the default certificate.

id.description: Unique ID of the Connection Server.

name.description: Connection Server host name or IP address.

services.description: Connection Server related Windows services information.

session_protocol_data.description: PCoIP, RDP or BLAST protocol sessions details when clients connect directly to the connection server.

session_threshold.description: The maximum number of connections allowed for the connection server through the Horizon client. If all of the secure gateways (HTTP(S)/PCOIP/BLAST) are enabled, this field denotes the maximum number of connections allowed for the connection server.If none of the secure gateways(HTTP(S)/PCOIP/BLAST) are enabled, sessionThreshold value will not be set.

status.description:
Status of the Connection Server.
* OK: The Connection Server is working properly.
* ERROR: Error occurred when connecting to Connection Server.
* NOT_RESPONDING: The Connection Server is not responding.
* UNKNOWN: Status of Connection Server is unknown.

tunnel_connection_count.description: Number of connections tunneled through this Connection Server.

ConnectionServerMonitorInfo.title: ConnectionServerMonitorInfo
ConnectionServerMonitorInfo.description: Monitoring information related to Connection Server.

service_name.description:
Service name of the Connection Server.
* PCOIP_SECURE_GATEWAY: PCoIP Secure Gateway service.
* BLAST_SECURE_GATEWAY: BLAST Secure Gateway service.
* SECURITY_GATEWAY_COMPONENT: Security Gateway Component service.

status.description:
Status of the service.
* UP: The Windows service is UP and running.
* DOWN: The Windows service is not UP.

ConnectionServerMonitorServiceStatus.title: ConnectionServerMonitorServiceStatus
ConnectionServerMonitorServiceStatus.description: Status of Connection Server related Windows service.

session_count.description: Number of active sessions launched using the protocol.

session_protocol.description:
Protocol used in launching the sessions through gateway service.
* PCOIP: The session display protocol is PCoIP.
* RDP: The session display protocol is RDP.
* BLAST: The session display protocol is BLAST.

ConnectionServerSessionProtocolData.title: ConnectionServerSessionProtocolData
ConnectionServerSessionProtocolData.description: Details of sessions launched using given protocol with Connection Server's gateway services.

id.description: Unique ID of the Enrollment Server.

status.description:
Enrollment server status.
* OK: The state of enrollment server is OK.
* ERROR: The enrollment server has an error.

port.description: The port of the database server.

prefix.description: The prefix for event tables in the database.

server_name.description: The name or ip address of the database server.

type.description:
The type of the database.
* ORACLE: An Oracle database.
* SQL_SERVER: A SQL server database.

user_name.description: The username used to connect to the database.

details.description: The basic details of the event database

event_count.description: Number of events recorded in the database

status.description:
State of the database.
* CONNECTED: Connection Server is connected to the database.
* CONNECTING: Connection Server is connecting to the database.
* DISCONNECTED: Connection Server is disconnected from the database.
* RECONNECTING: Connection Server is reconnecting to the database.
* ERROR: Error in connecting to the database from Connection Server.
* NOT_CONFIGURED: Database is not configured.

source.description:
Source of farm machines.
This property is required if type is set to "AUTOMATED".
* LINKED_CLONE: Linked clone share the same base image and use less storage space than full RDS Servers.
* INSTANT_CLONE: Instant clone engine uses vmfork technology to create the instant clones. These clones take much less time for provisioning.

type.description:
Farm type.
* AUTOMATED: Automated Farm.
* MANUAL: Manual farm.

application_count.description: Number of Applications published from the farm.

rds_server_count.description: Number of RDS Servers in the farm.

status.description:
Status of Farm.
* OK: Farm is enabled and no servers are in WARNING or ERROR state. One or more server(s) may be DISABLED (including the case where all of them are DISABLED).
* WARNING: Farm is enabled. One or more of the following is true:
1) One or more server(s) is either in WARNING or ERROR (not exceeding the predefined threshold) state.
2) The RDS Servers in this Farm present a mix of both known and unknown load preferences.
* ERROR: Farm is enabled. One or more server(s) (exceeding the predefined threshold) is in ERROR state, or, for Automated Farms, there could be a provisioning error.
* DISABLED: Farm is disabled.

address.description: Gateway host name or IP address.

internal.description: Indicates if the Gateway is internal.

type.description:
Type of the Gateway.
* UAG: Unified Access Gateway type.
* F5: F5 Gateway type.
* UNKNOWN: Unknown type.

active_connection_count.description: Number of active connections for the gateway. Includes PCoIP and BLAST connection counts.

blast_connection_count.description: Number of BLAST connections for the gateway.

pcoip_connection_count.description: Number of PCoIP connections for the gateway.

status.description:
Status of the Gateway.
* NOT_CONTACTED: There has been no contact from the gateway.
* PROBLEM: The gateway has reported a problem.
* STALE: Gateway is stale. Gateway will be marked as stale when Connection Server does not receive any request from the Gateway in last two successive intervals.
* OK: The Gateway is working as expected.

GatewayMonitorInfo.title: GatewayMonitorInfo
GatewayMonitorInfo.description: Monitoring information related to Gateways registered in the environment.

cache_size_mb.description: Size of the cache in megabytes. This property has a minimum value of 100. This property has a maximum value of 2048.

path.description: The path of the host that supports View Storage Accelerator.

HostOverrideData.title: HostOverrideData
HostOverrideData.description: Details of the Hypervisor hosts involved in Content Based Read Caching (CBRC)

ad_domain_id.description: ID of the AD Domain that this account user belongs to.

InstantCloneDomainAccountCreateSpec.title: InstantCloneDomainAccountCreateSpec
InstantCloneDomainAccountCreateSpec.description: Specification of the instant clone domain account.

ad_domain_id.description: ID of the AD Domain that this account user belongs to.

id.description: Unique ID representing instant clone domain account.

InstantCloneDomainAccountInfo.title: InstantCloneDomainAccountInfo
InstantCloneDomainAccountInfo.description: Information related to instant clone domain accounts of the environment.

InstantCloneDomainAccountUpdateSpec.title: InstantCloneDomainAccountUpdateSpec
InstantCloneDomainAccountUpdateSpec.description: Update specification for the instant clone domain account.

enabled.description: Indicates whether an endpoint is enabled. A disabled endpoint will be excluded from participating inter-pod communication.

id.description: Unique ID for a pod endpoint.

roundtrip_time.description: Round trip time (in milliseconds) for ping request between the local pod endpoint and the remote pod.

status.description:
Status of the pod endpoint.
* ONLINE: Pod endpoint is online and functional.
* UNCHECKED: Pod endpoint was offline and it just came back online but the system has not verified that it is functional.
* OFFLINE: Pod endpoint is offline or unreachable.

url.description: The URL for the pod endpoint. This address and special port will be used for inter-pod communication.

endpoints.description: The list of pod endpoints within this pod. An endpoint is basically a connection server in that pod.

site_id.description: The Id of the site this pod belongs to.

PodMonitorInfo.title: PodMonitorInfo
PodMonitorInfo.description: Monitoring information related to a pod.

max_sessions_count_configured.description: Maximum number of sessions for RDS server as configured by administrator. Will be unset if the value is not configured.

operating_system.description:
Operating System version.
* UNKNOWN: Unknown
* WINDOWS_SERVER_2003: Windows Server 2003
* WINDOWS_SERVER_2008: Windows Server 2008
* WINDOWS_SERVER_2008_R2: Windows Server 2008 R2
* WINDOWS_SERVER_2012: Windows Server 2012
* WINDOWS_SERVER_2012_R2: Windows Server 2012 R2
* WINDOWS_SERVER_2016: Windows Server 2016
* LINUX_SERVER_OTHER: Linux Server (other)

state.description:
State of RDS Server.
* WAIT_FOR_AGENT: Connection Server is waiting to establish communication with View Agent on a RDS Server.
* AGENT_UNREACHABLE: Connection Server cannot establish communication with View Agent on a RDS Server.
* AGENT_CONFIG_ERROR: The RDS Server has configuration error. Ex: Remote Desktop Service role is not enabled.
* AVAILABLE: The RDS Server is powered on and ready for an active connection.
* DISABLED: The RDS Server is disabled.
* DISABLE_IN_PROGRESS: Disabled RDS server still has some brokered sessions. It can still accept re-connections.
* PROVISIONING: The RDS Server is being provisioned.
* PROVISIONING_ERROR: An error occurred during provisioning.
* CUSTOMIZING: The RDS Server is being customized.
* DELETING: The RDS Server is marked for deletion. It will be deleted soon.
* MAINTENANCE: The RDS Server is in maintenance mode.
* ERROR: An unknown error occurred in the RDS Server.
* PROVISIONED: The RDS Server has been provisioned.
* CONNECTED: The RDS Server is in an active session.
* DISCONNECTED: The RDS Server is in an active session but is disconnected.
* AGENT_ERR_STARTUP_IN_PROGRESS: The Horizon Agent has started on the virtual machine, but other required services such as the display protocol are still starting.
* AGENT_ERR_DISABLED: The Horizon Agent is disabled.
* AGENT_ERR_INVALID_IP: The Horizon Agent has an invalid IP.
* AGENT_ERR_NEED_REBOOT: The Horizon Agent needs reboot.
* AGENT_ERR_PROTOCOL_FAILURE: Protocol such as RDP or PCoIP is not enabled.
* AGENT_ERR_DOMAIN_FAILURE: The RDS Server has an invalid domain.
* AGENT_DRAIN_MODE: The RDS Server is configured for drain mode.
* AGENT_DRAIN_UNTIL_RESTART: The RDS Server is configured a mode to drain until restart.
* ALREADY_USED: The RDS Server cannot accept new sessions.
* IN_PROGRESS: There is a RDS Server operation in progress.
* VALIDATING: The connection server is synchronizing state information with the agent.
* UNKNOWN: Could not determine the state of the RDS Server.

enabled.description: Indicates if RDS server is enabled.

farm_id.description: Indicates the Farm ID to which the RDS Server belongs to.

id.description: Unique ID of the RDS server.

load_index.description: This value is similar to load_preference and represents the load on RDS Server in the range of 0 to 100.

load_preference.description:
Based on the current load of this RDS Server, gives a measure of how preferential this server is to be chosen for new application sessions.
* BLOCK: RDS Server is blocked and new sessions will not be accepted.
* HEAVY: RDS Server is experiencing heavy load and should likely not be chosen for new sessions.
* NORMAL: RDS Server is experiencing normal load and is okay to be chosen for new sessions.
* LIGHT: RDS Server is experiencing light load and is okay to be chosen for new sessions.
* UNKNOWN: RDS Server did not report a load preference. This is potentially a configuration issue if other RDS Servers in the same Farm do report load preferences.

status.description:
RDS server status.
* OK: RDS Server is reachable. All applications (defined on its farm) are verified installed on the RDS Server.
* WARNING: RDS Server is reachable. Some applications are detected as not installed on the RDS Server.
* ERROR: RDS Server is unreachable, or, none of the applications are installed.
* DISABLED: RDS Server is disabled.

refresh_token.description: Refresh Token to be used to get a new Access token.

administrator_url.description: The administrator URL for the SAML authenticator.

label.description: The label of the SAML Authenticator.

metadata_url.description: The metadata URL of the SAML Authenticator.

id.description: Unique ID of the Connection Server.

name.description: Connection server host name or IP address.

status.description:
Status of the SAML authenticator with respect to this Connection Server.
* OK: The connection to SAML authenticator is working properly.
* ERROR: Error occurred when connecting to SAML authenticator.
* WARN: The connection to SAML authenticator has minor issues.
* UNKNOWN: State of SAML authenticator is unknown.

thumbprint_accepted.description: Indicates if the thumbprint of the SAML authenticator was accepted.

SAMLAuthenticatorMonitorConnectionServer.title: SAMLAuthenticatorMonitorConnectionServer
SAMLAuthenticatorMonitorConnectionServer.description: Information about the SAML authenticator connection from a connection server.

connection_servers.description: Information about the SAML authenticator connections from each of the connection servers.

id.description: Unique ID of the SAML Authenticator.

SAMLAuthenticatorMonitorInfo.title: SAMLAuthenticatorMonitorInfo
SAMLAuthenticatorMonitorInfo.description: Monitoring information related to SAML Authenticator.

default_cache_size_mb.description: Default size of the cache in megabytes. This property has a default value of 1024. This property has a minimum value of 100. This property has a maximum value of 2048.

enabled.description: Is View Storage Accelerator enabled? This property has a default value of false.

host_overrides.description: Cache size overrides for hosts which support View Storage Accelerator.

StorageAcceleratorData.title: StorageAcceleratorData
StorageAcceleratorData.description: Information about the Storage Accelerator Data

ad_domain_dns_name.description: The DNS name of the domain.

ad_domain_id.description: Unique ID of the AD Domain.

ad_domain_status.description:
The state of the domain health, taken as the most severe reported by one of the enrollment servers.
* OK: The state of the domain is OK as reported by the enrollment servers.
* WARN: At least one of the enrollment servers has a warning.
* ERROR: At least one of the enrollment servers is in an error state.

enabled.description: Indicates if the True SSO connector is enabled.

id.description: Unique ID of the True SSO Connector.

status.description:
Overall status of the True SSO connector.
* OK: All the components of the True SSO connector are fine.
* WARN: At least one component of the True SSO connector has a warning.
* ERROR: At least one component of the True SSO connector has an error.

template_name.description: Unique name for the True SSO template.

template_status.description:
The state of the template health, taken as the most severe reported by one of the enrollment servers.
* OK: The state of the template is OK as reported by the enrollment servers.
* WARN: At least one enrollment server reports a warning on this template.
* ERROR: At least one enrollment server reports an error on this template.

TrueSSOMonitorInfo.title: TrueSSOMonitorInfo
TrueSSOMonitorInfo.description: Monitoring information related to the True SSO Connector.

instant_clone_engine_provisioning_limit.description: Maximum concurrent instant clone engine provisioning operations. This property has a default value of 20. This property has a minimum value of 1.

power_operations_limit.description: Maximum concurrent virtual center power operations. This property has a default value of 50. This property has a minimum value of 1.

provisioning_limit.description: Maximum concurrent virtual center provisioning operations. This property has a default value of 20. This property has a minimum value of 1.

VCLimits.title: VCLimits
VCLimits.description: Information about the limits configured for Virtual Center

id.description: Unique ID of the Connection Server.

name.description: Connection server host name or IP address.

status.description:
Status of the Virtual Center Connection with respect to this Connection Server.
* OK: The connection to Virtual Center server is working properly.
* DOWN: The connection to Virtual Center server is down.
* RECONNECTING: The connection to Virtual Center server was lost and is being reconnected to.
* UNKNOWN: Connection state to Virtual Center server is unknown.
* INVALID_CREDENTIALS: The supplied credentials cannot be used to authenticate to the Virtual Center server.
* CANNOT_LOGIN: The connection server cannot login to the Virtual Center server.
* NOT_YET_CONNECTED: Connection server has not yet connected to Virtual Center server.

thumbprint_accepted.description: Indicates if the thumbprints of the Virtual Center was accepted.

VCMonitorConnectionServer.title: VCMonitorConnectionServer
VCMonitorConnectionServer.description: Information about the Virtual Center connection from connection server.

capacity_mb.description: The capacity of the datastore in megabytes.

free_space_mb.description: The free space on the datastore in megabytes.

status.description:
Status of the datastore.
* ACCESSIBLE: The datastore is accessible.
* NOT_ACCESSIBLE: The datastore is not accessible.

type.description:
Type of the datastore.
* VMFS: VMFS datastore.
* VSAN: VSAN datastore.

VCMonitorDatastore.title: VCMonitorDatastore
VCMonitorDatastore.description: Information about the datastore of the host(s) connected to the given Virtual Center.

api_version.description: API Version of the Virtual Center.

build.description: Build number of the Virtual Center.

cpu_core_count.description: Number of physical CPU cores on the host.

cpu_mhz.description: CPU speed per core in Mhz. This might be an averaged value if the speed is not uniform across all cores.

memory_size_mb.description: The physical memory size in mega bytes.

status.description:
Status of the host connection.
* CONNECTED: The host is successfully connected to Virtual Center server.
* DISCONNECTED: The host is disconnected from Virtual Center server.
* NOT_RESPONDING: The host is not responding.

VCMonitorHost.title: VCMonitorHost
VCMonitorHost.description: Information about the host connected to a Virtual Center.

api_version.description: API Version of the ESX Host.

cluster_name.description: Name of the cluster of the ESX Host in the Virtual Center.

name.description: ESX Host name or IP address.

vgpu_types.description: Types of vGPUs supported by this host.

VCMonitorHostDetails.title: VCMonitorHostDetails
VCMonitorHostDetails.description: Details of the ESX host of the Virtual Center.

id.description: Unique ID of the Connection Server.

name.description: Connection server host name or IP address.

status.description:
Status of the View Composer with respect to this Connection Server.
* OK: The connection to View Composer server is working properly.
* MALFORMED_URL: The connection to View Composer server was not possible due to a malformed URL.
* ERROR: Error occurred when connecting to View Composer server.
* CERT_ERROR: Certificate validation error when connecting to the View Composer server.

thumbprint_accepted.description: Indicates if the thumbprint of the View Composer was accepted.

ViewComposerMonitorConnectionServer.title: ViewComposerMonitorConnectionServer
ViewComposerMonitorConnectionServer.description: Information about the View Composer connection from connection server.

api_verion.description: The version of the View Composer API used to communicate with the View Composer server.

build.description: The build of the View Composer server.

min_esx_version.description: The minimum ESX version required for compatibility with this View Composer server.

min_vc_version.description: The minimum Virtual Center version required for compatibility with this View Composer server.

referenced_vcs.description: The Virtual Center servers referencing to this View Composer.

version.description: The version of the View Composer server.

connection_servers.description: Information about the View Composer connections from each of the connection servers.

name.description: View Composer server host name or IP address.

ViewComposerMonitorInfo.title: ViewComposerMonitorInfo
ViewComposerMonitorInfo.description: Monitoring information related to View Composer.

certificate_override.description: Virtual center certificate thumbprint should the client choose to override an invalid certificate.

description.description: Human readable description of the Virtual Center instance.

display_name.description: Human readable name of the Virtual Center instance.

enabled.description: Indicates if the virtual center is enabled.

id.description: Unique ID of the Virtual Center.

limits.description: Virtual center's limits for the number of concurrent operations.

port.description: Port of the virtual center to connect to.

se_sparse_reclamation_enabled.description: Indicates if Storage Efficiency Sparse (seSparse) reclamation is enabled.

server_name.description: Virtual Center's server name or IP address.

use_ssl.description: Indicates if SSL should be used when connecting to the server.

user_name.description: User name to use for the connection.

vmc_deployment.description: Indicates if virtual center is deployed in VMC.

connection_servers.description: Information about the Virtual Center connections from each of the connection servers.

datastores.description: Information about the datastores of the Virtual Center.

hosts.description: Information about the ESX hosts added in the Virtual Center.

id.description: Unique ID of the Virtual Center.

name.description: Virtual Center server name or IP address.

VirtualCenterMonitorInfo.title: VirtualCenterMonitorInfo
VirtualCenterMonitorInfo.description: Monitoring information related to a Virtual Center
